publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6580.1 Elizabeth Smith: Schoolsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-6580) in the name of Des McNulty, insert at end ", and deplores the threat of industrial action by some teaching unions, which will impact adversely on many of the extra-curricular activities that take place out of school hours and that are such an essential part of the wider educational experience for so many young people."
